wiimando.model
Class XMLReader

java.lang.Object
  wiimando.model.XMLReader

public class XMLReader
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to get and set the configuration in the XML configuration file. Is used by the others classes to obtain the information saved in the XML files.

Version:
2009/10/19
Author:
Boris Júnior, Jorge Pereira

saveXMLDefaultSpeedConfiguration

public void saveXMLDefaultSpeedConfiguration()
Used when the XML pointer speed configuration files are deleted. Creates two new XML files and saves the pointer speed configuration to that XML files.
